trans-unit.source: Visual Studio 2015 Download and Installation on what is needed before installing Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 2015 Download and Installation on what is needed before installing Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: What do I need to do before installing Visual Studio?
trans-unit.target: What do I need to do before installing Visual Studio?

trans-unit.source: Depending on your requirements and component selection, Visual Studio must manage a complex orchestration of packages, tools and SDK's.
trans-unit.target: Depending on your requirements and component selection, Visual Studio must manage a complex orchestration of packages, tools and SDK's.

trans-unit.source: In order to minimize any risk of incompatibility, we recommend going through this quick pre-flight check list to ensure that the underlying operation system can support Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: In order to minimize any risk of incompatibility, we recommend going through this quick pre-flight check list to ensure that the underlying operation system can support Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: Check your operating system and apply latest Windows Updates
trans-unit.target: Check your operating system and apply latest Windows Updates

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio requires Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or newer.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio requires Windows 7 Service Pack 1 or newer.

trans-unit.source: Please make sure that at a minimum you have Service Pack 1 installed and apply the latest Windows Updates.
trans-unit.target: Please make sure that at a minimum you have Service Pack 1 installed and apply the latest Windows Updates.

trans-unit.source: For more information about system requirements, please find the system requirements below.
trans-unit.target: For more information about system requirements, please find the system requirements below.

trans-unit.source: Run the installer as an Administrator
trans-unit.target: Run the installer as an Administrator

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio installer requires admin rights to install system packages and other dependencies.
trans-unit.target: The Visual Studio installer requires admin rights to install system packages and other dependencies.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio requires 4GB of disk space at the minimum.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio requires 4GB of disk space at the minimum.

trans-unit.source: Depending on your selection of workloads, installation packages can grow up to 30GB.
trans-unit.target: Depending on your selection of workloads, installation packages can grow up to 30GB.
